channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chase announces Paris Olympics perks for Sapphire Reserve cardholders
item.description: If you’re a Chase Sapphire Reserve® cardholder looking for more reasons to attend this year’s Olympic Games, you just found them. Chase has announced ...

item.title: Perfect for a road trip: Earn 8,000 Choice points or a $50 gift card for every 2 hotel stays

item.title: Last chance: Get Chase Sapphire Reserve’s highest bonus in over a year

item.title: Deal alert: Nonstop flights to London available from $537 round-trip
